Class Statistic

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.bettertrialbook.models.Statistic

  • public class Statistic
extends java.lang.Object
    Model for holding data related to statistics of an experiment

      • Quartiles

        public double[] Quartiles(java.util.ArrayList<Trial> trials)
        Find the 1st Quartile and the 3rd Quartile of the experiment
        Parameters:
        trials - The trial data for the experiment
        Returns:
        A List which contains the First Quartile Value and the Third Quartile Value quartile[0] = first quartile value ; quartile[1] = third quartile value

      • firstQuartile

        Helper Methods: Calculate the first Quartile in the dataSet
        Parameters:
        dataList - The data for each trial in the experiment
        medianIndex - The index in the dataList that is the median of the dataList
        Returns:
        The value of the first Quartile
